articles.title: Amazon UK discounts select Samsung, Xiaomi, OnePlus and Google phones for Black Friday Week - GSMArena.com news - GSMArena.com

articles.content:
Amazon UKs Black Friday deals are live the retailer offers discounts up to 45% on select smartphones. You can find the full list here, below are some of the highlights.
